statements: DELETE FROM RegulatoryComplianceReports WHERE supervisor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM RegulatoryComplianceReports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND compliance_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_department IN ('Finance', 'HR') AND reviewer_title = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_type = 'Data Privacy' AND compliance_details LIKE '%non-compliant%';
DELETE FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_pass = FALSE;
